model_device_fn = tf.train.replica_device_setter(10)
with tf.device(model_device_fn):
...
tf.get_variable()

should work. I also tried tf.fixed_size_partitioner(1) and it worked with nmt (tf.get_default_graph() shows expected devices).

body:
model_device_fn = tf.train.replica_device_setter(10)
 with tf.device(model_device_fn):
   ...
   tf.get_variable()

should work. I also tried tf.fixed_size_partitioner(1) and it worked with nmt (tf.get_default_graph() shows expected devices).
